channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mars Dust Devil Photobombs NASA Rover Selfie

item.title: Garmin Connect+ Gets New Trails Feature, Its Best Idea Yet?

item.title: Microsoft Adds Over 50 Activision Retro Games To Xbox Game Pass
item.description: Microsoft just added over 50 classic Activision retro games in new 'Retro Classics' app available now via Xbox Game Pass.

item.title: How AI Ecosystems Are Transforming Business Applications
item.description: What do all the stakeholders have to gain from enterprise software markets operating within these massive ecosystems?
